FuncDef:
The flowspec dynamic-create enable command enables dynamic BGP FlowSpec creation.
The undo flowspec dynamic-create enable command disables dynamic BGP FlowSpec creation.
By default, dynamic BGP FlowSpec creation is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the board needs to support BGP IPv6 FlowSpec, run the flowspec dynamic-create enable command to enable dynamic BGP FlowSpec creation.
Precautions
This command applies only to the LPUF-50/LPUF-50-L/LPUI-21-L/LPUI-51-L/LPUF-51/LPUF-51-B/LPUI-51/LPUI-51-B/LPUS-51/LPUF-101/LPUF-101-B/LPUI-101/LPUI-101-B/LPUS-101.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
